trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允許將 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊儲存在屬性目標的中繼資料，而且由系統在執行階段存取。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.
trans-unit.target: 命令式安全性，為使用對應的權限類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to demand that the calling code have <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何要求呼叫程式碼具備<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission>。

trans-unit.source: Demands are typically made in managed libraries (DLLs) to help protect methods or classes from potentially harmful code.
trans-unit.target: 要求通常是在 managed 程式庫 (Dll)，協助防範潛在危險的程式碼中的方法或類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAttribute" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAttribute" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> that corresponds to this attribute.
This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 只應該由應用程式程式碼永遠不會由安全性系統中，呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換成中繼資料的序列化形式。

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 建立中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料，從 的權限，此方法會傳回對應至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to open files through the file dialog is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示是否宣告要經由檔案對話方塊開啟檔案的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to open files through the file dialog is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已宣告要經由檔案對話方塊開啟檔案的使用權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to save files through the file dialog is declared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示是否宣告要經由檔案對話方塊儲存檔案的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission to save files through the file dialog is declared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已宣告要經由檔案對話方塊儲存檔案的使用權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
